# NOTE: Planet (slot) counts are calculated with forced giants counting as 2 planets

# SPECIAL NOTE: 
#	The order and system naming convention used here has been altered from the vanilla naming  
#	convention because of the possibility of additional automatically generated systems.  Most 
#	vanilla systems are still present in this list.  Exceptions are those that come later due 
#	to final_frontier's monster expansion system.


### Privateer Conglomerate
hostile_home_init_1 = {
	class = sc_m
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_0 }
		}
	}



	flags = { pirate_home_system pirate_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 27
		has_ring = no

		init_effect = {
			create_pirate_country = yes
			event_target:pirate_country = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_modifier = pirate_power
						}
					}
					add_modifier = {
						modifier = pirate_power
						days = -1
					}
				}
			}
			#create_fleet = {

			#		}

			#	}
			#}

			create_fleet = {
				name = "Old Guard"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
					set_fleet_flag = pirate_home_system_fleet
					while = {
						count = 1
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "Pirate Galleon"
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}
					#while = {
					#	count = 4
					#	create_ship = {

					#		graphical_culture = "pirate_01"

					#		graphical_culture = "pirate_01"

					#}

					#		design = "Marauder"
					#		graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
					#	}
					#}
					#set_formation_scale = 3.0
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 250
					set_location = {
						target = prev
						distance = 90
						angle = 330
					}
					set_fleet_flag = pirate_home_system_fleet
				}
			}

			create_fleet = {
				name = "Scarred Veterans"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
					set_fleet_flag = pirate_home_system_fleet
					while = {
						count = 6
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "Corsair"
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}
					while = {
						count = 10
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "Marauder"
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}
					while = {
						count = 20
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = "Black Earl"
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}
					while = {
						count = 4

					}

			}

			create_fleet = {
				name = "Young Blood"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:pirate_country
					create_ship_design = {
						design = Reaver
						ftl = warp
					}
					while = {
						count = 4
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = last_created_design
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}
					create_ship_design = {
						design = Hunter
						ftl = warp
					}
					while = {
						count = 4
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = last_created_design
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}

						design = Vagabond
						ftl = warp
					}
					while = {
						count = 4
						create_ship = {
							name = random
							design = last_created_design
							graphical_culture = "pirate_01"
						}
					}

						target = prev
						distance = 90
						angle = 200
					}

					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 150
					set_fleet_flag = pirate_home_system_fleet
					save_global_event_target_as = young_blood
				}
			}
		}

	}

							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Yellow_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 14
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Yellow_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 16
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Yellow_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 144
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Blue_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 20
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 216
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Emerald_Guardians"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						while = {
							count = 6
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green_Elite"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 16
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green_Elite"
							}
						}
						set_location = {
							target = prevprev
							distance = 40
							angle = 288
						}
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 500
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}


	neighbor_system = {
		distance = { min = 0 max = 50 }
		initializer = "hostile_green_01"
	}

	neighbor_system = {
		distance = { min = 0 max = 50 }
		initializer = "hostile_red_01"
	}
}

hostile_green_01 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8

	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.011.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.011.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.011.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

hostile_red_01 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"

### Cloud Home
hostile_home_init_3 = {
	class = sc_supermassive_black_hole
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 10
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_2 }
		}
	}



	max_instances = 1
	spawn_chance = 100
	flags = { hostile_system void2_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 100

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		entity = "barren_planet_01_destroyed_entity"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 50
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 28 }
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_cloud_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = yes }
			save_event_target_as = voidhome_star
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous3_physics_deposit
			}
			event_target:cloud_country = {
				save_event_target_as = voidhome_owner
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Abyssal_Host"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:cloud_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Cloud_Entity"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Cloud_Entity"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Cloud_Entity"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Cloud_Entity"
						}
						set_location = event_target:voidhome_star
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Chasmal_Horde"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:cloud_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Cloud_Entity"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Cloud_Entity"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Cloud_Entity"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Cloud_Entity"
						}
						set_location = event_target:voidhome_star
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

### Drone Home and neighbors
hostile_home_init_4 = {
	class = sc_o
	asteroids_distance = 231
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 10
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_4 }
		}
	}



	max_instances = 1
	spawn_chance = 100
	flags = { hostile_system drone_home_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 39
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 150

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	change_orbit = 15

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	change_orbit = 17

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	change_orbit = 17

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	change_orbit = 17

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
						init_effect = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Mining_Corps"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:drone_country
					while = {
						count = 12
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
						}
					}
					while = {
						count = 3
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
						}
					}
					set_location = {
						target = prev
						distance = 20
						angle = 0
					}
					set_formation_scale = 2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 200
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Asset_Protection_Unit"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:drone_country
					while = {
						count = 10
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
						}
					}
					set_location = {
						target = prev
						distance = 20
						angle = 180
					}
					set_formation_scale = 2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 200
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = event_target:ore_grinder }
				}
				set_planet_flag = ore_grinder_planet
				orbital_deposit_tile = {
					clear_deposits = yes
					add_deposit = d_enormous3_mineral_deposit
				}
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Central_Processing"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						create_ship = {
							name = "NAME_Ore_Grinder"
							design = "NAME_Drone_Home_Base"
							graphical_culture = "drone"
						}
						set_location = prev
						save_event_target_as = ore_grinder
						set_fleet_flag = ore_grinder
					}
				}
				else = {
					create_mining_station = {
						owner = event_target:drone_country
					}
				}
			}
		}


	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_molten"
		orbit_distance = 17
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
	}

	change_orbit = 17

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

		distance = { min = 0 max = 50 }
		initializer = "hostile_drone_destroyer_system"
	}

		distance = { min = 0 max = 50 }
		initializer = "hostile_drone_system"
	}
}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "Asset Protection Unit"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 7
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "Ancient Combat Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "Ancient Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			class = "pc_frozen"

		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "Ancient Mining Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "Ancient Combat Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1

		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }

		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

		orbit_distance = 56

		change_orbit = 11

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

#	 5 inner and 6 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 10 (NO ITERATIONS)

	class = sc_o
	asteroids_distance = 298
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 30

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 39
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 150

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			size = 8
		}
	}

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6

			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

						}

							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }

		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

		}
	}

		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		}

		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#A Type with Accretion features. Details:

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

		count = 1
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0

	}

	}

	}

		}

			count = 1
			class = rl_ff_jovian_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren_cold"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		size = 33

#A Type with PotentialWarmLife features. Details:

#A Type with PotentialWarmLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: -1, 6)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_028 = {
	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 2

		count = 1:
		class = star

		count = 1

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialWarmLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 6, -1)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_035 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 189
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 3


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_distance = 35
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 16 max = 22 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1

		orbit_distance = 22
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }

	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_planets
		orbit_distance = 22
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

	change_orbit = 22

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = random_asteroid
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1

		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 12
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 12
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}

			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6

			size = 7
		}
	}

		count = 1

		moon = {
			count = 1

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}

			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

###########################################################
#A Type with PotentialWarmLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 6, 4)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

# APPEARANCE ODDS BELOW INCLUSION THRESHOLD.  Skipping system

###########################################################
#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: -1, -1)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_036 = {
	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 2


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_distance = 35
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_temperate_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 16 max = 22 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 22
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

		orbit_distance = 22

		size = { min = 10 max = 15 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

###########################################################
#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: -1, 5)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

# APPEARANCE ODDS BELOW INCLUSION THRESHOLD.  Skipping system

###########################################################
#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: -1, 6)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_037 = {
	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 2


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_distance = 35
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_temperate_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 16 max = 22 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"

			size = 8

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8

		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8

	}

	Planet = {

		class = rl_ff_ice_giants

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11

			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"

			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 12
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }

		moon = {
