			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		}	
	}

}

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 145
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 17


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }

#A Type with PotentialWarmLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 4, 5)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_117 = {
	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 5


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

		}

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialWarmLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 6, -1)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_121 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 189
	usage = misc_system_init

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

	init_effect = {

				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit

							}
						}

						set_fleet_stance = aggressive

						set_aggro_range = 200

				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}

		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

			class = "pc_frozen"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }

			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 0

		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 3, 5)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_129 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 123
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 5


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_3 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_hot_planets
		orbit_distance = 35
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 11 max = 17 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 3, 6)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant;

	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 123
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 17


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_3 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no

		orbit_distance = 22

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

	asteroids_distance = 145

	usage_odds = 17

		count = 1:

		orbit_angle = 1

###########################################################
#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 4, 5)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_132 = {
	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 5


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_3 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }

			size = 8

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialTemperateLife features. Details:

	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 189
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 29


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_3 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no

		count = 1

		}
	}

		change_orbit = 11

		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station }
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 3
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 200
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:drone_country
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialCoolLife features. Details:

	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 21


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialCoolLife features. Details:

		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialCoolLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: -1, 4)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_140 = {
	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 4


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 12
			flags = { can_terraform limited_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
			flags = { can_terraform limited_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: -1, 5)

hostile_init_141 = {
	class = sc_a
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 7


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_giant_moons

		}

		change_orbit = 11

			class = "pc_frozen"

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

				}
			}

				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}

#A Type with PotentialCoolLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 3, 6)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_146 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 106
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 18


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 16 max = 22 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}

			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 7
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cold_moon_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 26 }

		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_toxic"
			orbit_distance = 0

		change_orbit = 11

			size = 10

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#A Type with PotentialCoolLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 5, -1)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_150 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 150
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 30


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_warm_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 16 max = 22 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_semi-cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 18
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 16 max = 22 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 20
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 12 max = 18 }
		flags = { can_terraform }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_cool_planets
		orbit_distance = 22
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

###########################################################
#A Type with PotentialCoolLife features. Details:
#	 4 inner and 4 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 7 (Iteration: 5, 3)
#	Additional Features:  Puff Giant; 

hostile_init_151 = {
	class = sc_a
	asteroids_distance = 176
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = 6


	flags = { hostile_system drone_system_1 }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 33
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 35

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 26 max = 27 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_gas_giants
		orbit_distance = 44

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_ice_giants
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_immense_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 10
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = rl_ff_ice_giant_accretion_moons
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_amoeba_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { is_star = no }
			event_target:amoeba_country = {
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Space_Amoeba"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:amoeba_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Small_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Large_Space_Organism_Teal"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 100
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = rl_ff_kuiper_planets
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_drone_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = { 
				has_deposit_for = shipclass_mining_station
				is_star = no
				NOT = { is_planet_class = pc_gas_giant }
			}
			orbital_deposit_tile = {
				clear_deposits = yes
				add_deposit = d_enormous1_mineral_deposit
			}
			event_target:drone_country = {
				save_event_target_as = mining_drones
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drones"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:drone_country
						while = {
							count = 8
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Mining_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 4
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Combat_Drone"
							}
						}
						while = {
							count = 2
							create_ship = {
								name = ""
								design = "NAME_Ancient_Destroyer"
							}
						}
						set_location = PREVPREV
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
						set_aggro_range = 150
						queue_actions = {
							repeat = {
								wait = {
									duration = 999
									random = 10
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_mining_station = {
				owner = event_target:mining_drones
			}
		}	
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_159 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system blue_system shield_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {

		base = 4

			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_163 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system blue_system shield_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1

		}
		modifier = {

            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }

#A Type with no features.  Details:

hostile_init_167 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system blue_system shield_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star

		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24

###########################################################
#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_169 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system blue_system shield_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system blue_system shield_system }

	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1751.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1751.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1751.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_176 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1771.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1771.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1771.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_178 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ice_giant"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

					}

					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}

						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"

						name = ""

					}

						name = ""

					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1791.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1791.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1791.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_180 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1801.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1801.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1801.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1811.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1811.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1811.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_182 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_distance = 31
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6

			count = 1

		}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
