		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1821.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1821.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1821.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_184 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1841.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1841.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1841.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

hostile_init_185 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"

		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_186 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1861.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1861.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1861.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_188 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

	Planet = {

		class = "pc_toxic"

		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1881.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1881.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1881.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no

		}

			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no

					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"

						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1891.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1891.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_190 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_distance = 4

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1901.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1901.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC.1901.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_191 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star

		}

			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no

						repeat = {

						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_4
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 30
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }

			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"

		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {

					create_ship = {

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_194 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	init_effect = {
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"

					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_197 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {

					create_ship = {

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"

		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {

					}
					create_ship = {

							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {

				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {

					}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_199 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_200 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ice_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10

	init_effect = {
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"

					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""

					}

			factor = 0

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_202 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {

				effect = {

					create_ship = {

				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}

		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}

				is_star = no
				is_moon = no

					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {

			factor = 0

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_205 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_distance = 31
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
			flags = { can_terraform }
		}
	}

		count = 1

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0

	Planet = {

		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_3
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_4
		}
		create_crystal_country = yes
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = red_crystals
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 30
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Ruby_Stack"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}
					set_location = event_target:red_trigger_4
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 30
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							wait = {
								duration = 9999
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

            has_star_flag = empire_cluster

	init_effect = {

					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1

		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = red_trigger_3
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:red_trigger_2

				}
			}

#A Type with no features.  Details:

hostile_init_207 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {

		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2071.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2071.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2071.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2081.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2081.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2081.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2101.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2101.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2101.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_211 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no

					}

						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"

						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self

		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2121.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2121.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2121.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_213 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

		}

		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2141.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2141.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2141.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:

hostile_init_215 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2161.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2161.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2161.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_217 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}
