					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2181.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2181.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2181.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:

hostile_init_219 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

	Planet = {

		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"

		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2191.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2191.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2191.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2201.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2201.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2201.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

hostile_init_221 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 0
		#modifier = {
		#	factor = 0
		#	NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		#}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

	Planet = {

		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				is_moon = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Large_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2211.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2211.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2211.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 100
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2221.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2221.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC.2221.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no

					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1

			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2

				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}

			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }

							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

			}
			if = {

		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

		init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}						
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						set_location = event_target:blue2_trigger_3
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_2 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {

						}

							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}						
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

				}
			}

					effect = {

						create_ship = {

						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

							name = ""

	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system blue_system shield_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country

						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {

						}
						set_location = event_target:blue2_trigger_3
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive

					}
				}
			}

						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						set_location = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country

							name = ""

						}

					}
				}
			}
			if = {

				create_fleet = {

					effect = {

			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}						
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

						}

						create_ship = {

							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"

				}

					effect = {

			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA

	}

		init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""

						}

							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						set_location = event_target:blue2_trigger_3
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
			if = {

						set_location = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_233 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system blue_system shield_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no

		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

		init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}						
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						set_location = event_target:blue2_trigger_3
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_2 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}						
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""

						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_1 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_235 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system blue_system shield_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ice_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

		init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"

							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_2 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}

							name = ""

						}

					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country

		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country

				}

#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_238 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 4
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system blue_system shield_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_distance = 31
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ice_giant"
		orbit_distance = 44
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0

			orbit_distance = 4

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

		init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = blue2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_3 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}						
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						set_location = event_target:blue2_trigger_3
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_2 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}						
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						set_location = event_target:blue2_trigger_2
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = event_target:blue2_trigger_1 }
				create_fleet = {
					name = "NAME_Sapphire_Lurkers"
					effect = {
						set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						create_ship = {
							name = ""
							design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Blue"
						}
						set_location = event_target:blue2_trigger_1
						set_fleet_stance = aggressive
						set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
						set_aggro_range = 150
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_239 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2391.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2391.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2391.trigger.3"

								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {

					}

						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2392.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_240 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}

						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2401.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2401.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}

								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2402.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this

								}
							}

								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2411.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2411.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2411.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2412.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {

						}
					}

			}

				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {

						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2422.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2422.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2422.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2423.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2423.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2423.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_243 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_distance = 0

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2431.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2431.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2431.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2432.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2432.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2432.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}

						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}

						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"

		orbit_distance = 56
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 10 max = 22 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2441.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {

				effect = {

					create_ship = {
						name = ""

									id = "greenC2.2453.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2453.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_246 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = 1
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

		change_orbit = 6

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_frozen"
		orbit_distance = 27
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 12 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2461.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2461.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2461.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2462.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2462.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2462.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2463.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2463.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this

								}
							}

								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2471.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2471.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2472.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2472.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2472.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""

					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_2

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_248 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2481.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2481.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2481.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2482.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {

								}

									move_to = this

							}

									id = "greenC2.2482.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
