		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2491.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2491.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2491.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2492.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this

								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this

								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}

	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init

		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}

            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }

					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2502.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2502.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2502.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2503.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {

									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2503.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_251 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {

		class = "pc_toxic"

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2511.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2511.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2511.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2512.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2512.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2512.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2521.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2521.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2521.trigger.3"

								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""

									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2533.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2533.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

#A Type with no features.  Details:

hostile_init_254 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system green_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:green2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = green2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = green2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2541.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2541.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2541.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}
					set_location = event_target:green2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "greenC2.2542.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {

									is_planet = event_target:green2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this

								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Green"
					}

	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}
	
	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Red"
					}

						repeat = {
							wait = {

hostile_init_261 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}
	
	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24

###########################################################
#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_262 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}
	
	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 24 max = 48 }
		change_orbit = 6
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_barren"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 8
		}
	}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_263 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}
	
	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1

	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init

		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}
	
	max_instances = 1



	flags = { hostile_system red_system }

		base = 2

			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }

            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }

            has_star_flag = empire_cluster

###########################################################
#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_271 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_ice_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}

		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2711.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2711.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2711.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2712.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this

									id = "onyxC2.2712.trigger.1"

								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"

					queue_actions = {

							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2713.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3

	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2721.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2721.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}

								trigger = {

								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""

					}

					}

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2722.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_273 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }
		change_orbit = 11
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 6
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 10
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2731.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2731.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}

									move_to = this

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2732.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}

									move_to = this

								}
							}

								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2732.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""

					}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2741.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2741.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2741.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2742.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this

								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {

								}
								found_planet = {

								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2742.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {

					queue_actions = {

								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2743.trigger.3"

	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2751.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2751.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}

									orbit_planet = this

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""

						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1

					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40

							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {

									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_276 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"

					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2761.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2761.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}

								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {

					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2762.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this

			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2771.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2771.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2771.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2772.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2772.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2772.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {

					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2773.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3

	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2781.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2782.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2782.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2782.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {

						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2783.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2783.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2783.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {

		}

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_279 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 31

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_barren"
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
		size = { min = 8 max = 14 }
	}

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_toxic"
		orbit_distance = 31
		orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }

			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2791.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2791.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2791.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2792.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {

				effect = {

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2801.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2801.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2801.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""

					}

							find_closest_planet = {

									id = "onyxC2.2813.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

}

			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2821.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2821.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2821.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2822.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2822.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2822.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"

									id = "onyxC2.2823.trigger.3"

			size = 3
		}
		moon = {
			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_frozen"
			orbit_distance = 4
			orbit_angle = { min = 30 max = 270 }
			size = 3
		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2831.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2831.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2831.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {

						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2832.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {

								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {

						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}

					}

						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {

							find_closest_planet = {

#A Type with no features.  Details:
#	 2 inner and 2 outer terrestrial Planets; target Giant count = 2 (NO ITERATIONS)

hostile_init_284 = {
	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}

	max_instances = 2	# MODIFIED FROM VANILLA



	flags = { hostile_system }

	planet = {
		count = 1:
		class = star
		orbit_distance = 0
		orbit_angle = 1
		size = 24
		has_ring = no
	}

	change_orbit = 44

	Planet = {
		count = 1
		class = "pc_gas_giant"

		size = { min = 19 max = 22 }

			count = { min = 0 max = 1 }
			class = "pc_molten"
			orbit_distance = 0

		}
	}

	init_effect = {
		create_crystal_country = yes
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_1
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_2
		}
		random_system_planet = {
			limit = {
				is_star = no
				NOT = {
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					is_same_value = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_trigger_3
		}
		event_target:crystal_country = {
			save_event_target_as = onyx2_owner
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = return_point
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2851.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2851.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2851.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					set_location = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
					set_fleet_stance = aggressive
					set_aggro_range_measure_from = self
					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2852.trigger.2"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_2
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2852.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2852.trigger.1"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_1
								}
								found_planet = {
									move_to = this
									orbit_planet = this
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			create_fleet = {
				name = "NAME_Emerald_Roamers"
				effect = {
					set_owner = event_target:crystal_country
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Medium_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"
					}
					create_ship = {
						name = ""
						design = "NAME_Small_Crystal_Entity_Onyx"

					set_aggro_range = 40
					queue_actions = {
						repeat = {
							find_closest_planet = {
								trigger = {
									id = "onyxC2.2853.trigger.3"
									is_planet = event_target:onyx2_trigger_3
								}

	class = sc_pulsar
	usage = misc_system_init
	usage_odds = {
		base = 2
		modifier = {
			factor = 0
			NOT = { is_in_cluster = resource_cluster_1 }
		}
		modifier = {
            factor = 0
            has_star_flag = empire_cluster
        }
	}
